casebody.data:
In re the Matter of the Involuntary Termination of the Parent-Child Relationship of: K.M., H.M., K.M. (Minor Children), and H.J. (Mother), Appellant-Respondent,
v.
The INDIANA DEPARTMENT OF CHILD SERVICES, Appellee-Petitioner,
and
Child Advocates, Inc., Appellee (Guardian ad Litem). Court of Appeals Case No. 49A05-1707-JT-1498 Court of Appeals of Indiana. FILED December 29, 2017

DISPOSITION OF CASE BY UNPUBLISHED MEMORANDUM DECISION

ROBB , J.

Affirmed.

CRONE, J., Concurs.

BRADFORD, J., Concurs.
